mapper.select: select re_no, re_title, re_content, re_date, re_chk, m_no, p_no, re_name, rnum from (select re_no, re_title, re_content, re_date, re_chk, m_no, p_no, re_name, rownum as rnum from (select r1.re_no, re_title, re_content, to_char(re_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as re_date, re_chk, m_no, p_no, re_name, rownum as rnum from review r1 inner join (select max(re_no) re_no from review group by p_no) r2 on r1.re_no = r2.re_no order by re_no desc) where rownum <= #{end_data} order by re_chk asc) where rnum >= #{start_data}
